"Astarte":
"<%me>.
My apologies for contacting you out of the blue."

"It's nice to meet you.
My name is Astarte.
I am a basic instruction officer for ARKS."
"Pleased to make your acquaintance."
"There is a tutorial program made just for people like you... it's called the ARKS Road."
"This program is highly recommended for people who are not yet used to ARKS activities."

"I believe it will be easier to understand once you've seen it.
First, please take this."
"As you fill in this stamp card, you should naturally learn more about ARKS."

"The first goal on this stamp card is to go meet Astarte.
In other words, come to see me."

"That's all for now. See you again.
I look forward to working together."
"Astarte"
"Sierra"

"Oh, that's right.
I forgot to ask."
"To help familiarize things, how about we give you some easy coaching? I can introduce you to the one in charge."
"Nice to meet you, my name is Astarte. I am a basic instruction officer for ARKS."
"If my information is correct, you're a beginner who's just joined ARKS."
"If my information is correct, you were in cold sleep hibernation. There's a chance that your memories are scrambled."
"I would like to recommend a tutorial practice program called ARKS Road."
"It teaches the various basic ARKS activities that we might do daily, and it might help you remember."

"I believe it will be easier to understand once you've seen it.
First, please take this."
"As you fill in this stamp card, you should naturally gain knowledge as ARKS."

"The first stamp goal is
「Visit Astarte」.
So please, come to me."

"それでは。
以後よろしくお願いします。"

"「ストーリーボード」の解放条件に
森林探索のクリア、とあるけども
これはどうすればいいんだろう……？"

"そんなお悩みの貴方にお勧めなのが
アスタルテさんの
「アークスロード」なんです！"

"「森林探索」の解放までの道のりも
ばっちりガイドしてくれますからね。
「アークスロード」進めてみましょう！"
